The Hyperspace region





FH




    		     

 featureless hyperplane 

room  > featureless hyperplane

always-indefinite 

printed name: "featureless hyperplane" 

description: "[If featureless hyperplane is not visited][We] [rub] [our] eyes as [we] [try] to take in [our] surroundings. [end if][if Descending Stair is not in Featureless Hyperplane]In addition to the usual directions of north and south and east and west, two new directions exist here: [italic type]back[roman type] and [italic type]forth[roman type]. As a result, the 'surface' [we're] standing on is in fact a three-dimensional hyperplane. Up and down still exist, and there is gravity, apparently.

As far as one can see, the hyperplane extends infinitely in all six directions[otherwise]It is made of the same gossamer, questionably real stuff as the ground, the pillar, and the readouts. You can't see past the first turn of the stairs, unfortunately[end if]." 

map region: Hyperspace 

preposition: "on" 

snarky remark: "This is the most featureless hyperplane I've ever seen."
